com.mockrunner.base

Class WebTestModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mockrunner.base.WebTestModule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HTMLOutputModule

    public abstract class WebTestModule
extends Object
    This class provides some convenience methods for request and session attribute handling
